text: Meet the Blacks is a 2016 American horror comedy film directed by Deon Taylor, written by Taylor and Nicole DeMasi, and is a parody of the 2013 film The Purge. It stars Mike Epps, Gary Owen, Zulay Henao, Lil Duval, Bresha Webb, George Lopez and Mike Tyson. This was Charlie Murphy's last role before his death from leukemia in 2017. The film was released on April 1, 2016, by Freestyle Releasing.
